Title: Relates to permitting certain claims for compensation based on a COVID-19 diagnosis
Summary: Relates to permitting certain claims for compensation based on a COVID-19 diagnosis which were denied or not timely filed.
LawCode: Add ยง3-a, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to certain claims for compensation based on a COVID-19 diagnosis; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
